_usage: This file controls which SAP systems and users can connect to SAP with ABAP FS
_telemetry: It also enables telemetry developer grouping - multiple user IDs of SAME person are grouped together in analytics
_allowedDomains: Wildcard patterns for allowed SAP system hostnames and ADT domains (case-insensitive matching)
_developers_purpose: Each developer object represents ONE person with their multiple user IDs across different systems
_developers_grouping: All userIds within one developer object will be tracked as the SAME person in telemetry (anonimized)
_warning: DO NOT mix different people's IDs in one developer object - this will incorrectly group them as one person!
_example_john: If John has IDs 'john.doe', 'j0d0o3e', 'john.d' - put all THREE in one developer object
_example_wrong: WRONG: Putting John's and Jane's IDs together in one developer object
